p: Results: There was a higher organism clearance rate in the colistin compared to the control group (p = 0.02). Multi-drug resistant organisms were observed in [26 (50 %) vs 13 (39.4 %), p = 0.79 ] of the Colistin and Control groups respectively. There was a higher clearance rate of MDR organisms [21/26(81 %) vs 3/13(23 %), p = 0.0005] in Colistin vs. Control groups respectively.
